symptoms.name: Burning pain
symptoms.pattern: Chronic, constant, intermittent, spontaneous, or evoked; localized, unilateral

symptoms.name: Allodynia
symptoms.pattern: Pain evoked by normally nonpainful stimuli (e.g., light touch)

physical_findings: Pain in the area of previous shingles rash
risk_factors: Shingles affecting trigeminal dermatomes or brachial plexus

required: Pain persisting >3 months after onset of shingles rash in the same affected area
supportive: Pain localized to the dermatome affected by shingles
